enum: Number of local governments that adopt and implement local DRR strategies in line with national strategies [1.5.4, 11.b.2, 13.1.3]
Proportion of local governments that adopt and implement local disaster risk reduction strategies in line with national disaster risk reduction strategies [1.5.4, 11.b.2, 13.1.3]

title: Proporción de gobiernos locales que adoptan y aplican estrategias locales de reducción del riesgo de desastres en consonancia con las estrategias nacionales de reducción del riesgo de desastres
